feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2019-10-25: v. 7.9 is available
entry.content: v. 7.9 is available. Added an option for blocking the dockwidgets on the main window, fixed bug
entry.summary: v. 7.9 is available. Added an option for blocking the dockwidgets on the main window, fixed bug

entry.title: 2019-10-23: v. 7.9 RC2 is available
entry.content: The Release Candidate 2 for v. 7.9 is available. Introduced a new function: time budget bar plot (duration and number of occurences of behaviors)
entry.summary: The Release Candidate 2 for v. 7.9 is available. Introduced a new function: time budget bar plot (duration and number of occurences of behaviors)

entry.title: 2019-10-15: v. 7.9 RC1 is available
entry.content: The Release Candidate 1 for v. 7.9 is available. Introduced 2 functions: Advanced event filtering and Behavors Binary Table. Many bugs fixed.
entry.summary: The Release Candidate 1 for v. 7.9 is available. Introduced 2 functions: Advanced event filtering and Behavors Binary Table. Many bugs fixed.

entry.title: 2019-08-30: v. 7.8 is available
entry.content: v. 7.8 is available. Introduced an option for limiting the observation time interval and to display an image overlay on video.
entry.summary: v. 7.8 is available. Introduced an option for limiting the observation time interval and to display an image overlay on video.
